name: Lisa
line: Marcus, you're watching anime so much (and so loud) that I feel like a Shojo character too.

name: Lisa
line: How about take a walk, do something cool outside instead of sitting all day home in front of the TV?

name: Marcus
line: I thought this what you humans do.

name: Marcus
line: Actually I have one! How about saving the world?

name: Marcus
line: Let me explain. I've watched enough documentaries...

name: Marcus
line: So you can become a magical girl! Imagine, saving the world, flying in sparkles!!!

name: Marcus
line: And I'll be a proud humble familiar by your side.
